characters.name: KARU
characters.description: Väike pruun karu, pehmete suurte kõrvadega, kandmas väikest sinist salli ja punaseid kindaid. Tal on sõbralik naeratus ja lahked silmad. Armas multifilmistiil.

characters.name: KETTU
characters.description: Väike oranž rebane, koheva sabaga, kandmas väikest rohelist mütsi ja kollaseid kindaid. Tal on uudishimulik näoilme ja säravad silmad. Armas multifilmistiil.

locations.name: Mugav salongi
locations.description: Cozy cabin living room with light brown wooden walls, a warm rug on the wooden floor, and a large stone fireplace on the back wall where a small fire is crackling. There's a single window on the left wall showing snowy trees outside. Two comfy armchairs with soft blankets are positioned near the fireplace. A small wooden table is between the armchairs. Warm, soft lamp light fills the room. Cartoon style.

locations.name: Lumemets
locations.description: Serene snowy forest clearing surrounded by tall pine trees covered in fresh white snow. The ground is covered in deep, untouched snow. The sky is bright blue and clear. The small, simple wooden cabin is partially visible in the background. Soft winter sunlight. Cartoon style.

pages.scene: Karu and Kettu are sitting in two comfy armchairs near the stone fireplace in their cozy cabin living room. Karu is in one armchair with a blue scarf and red gloves, Kettu is in the other with a green hat and yellow gloves. A warm fire crackles in the fireplace. The room has light brown wooden walls and a wooden floor with a rug.

Karu and Kettu are standing near the window on the left wall of their cozy cabin living room, looking out. Karu wears a blue scarf and red gloves, Kettu wears a green hat and yellow gloves. Outside, snowy trees are visible. The room has light brown wooden walls, a wooden floor with a rug, and a stone fireplace.

Karu and Kettu are standing next to each other in their cozy cabin living room, smiling conspiratorially and whispering. Karu has a blue scarf and red gloves, Kettu has a green hat and yellow gloves. They are pointing towards the window. The room has light brown wooden walls, a wooden floor with a rug, and a stone fireplace.

Karu and Kettu, bundled in their winter clothes (Karu with blue scarf and red gloves, Kettu with green hat and yellow gloves), are stepping out of their small wooden cabin into the deep snow of the forest clearing. Snowy pine trees surround them under a bright blue sky.

Karu and Kettu are actively pushing and piling up fresh white snow in the snowy forest clearing. Karu (blue scarf, red gloves) uses his paws to push snow, Kettu (green hat, yellow gloves) is helping to shape the beginnings of a snow cave. Snowy pine trees are in the background under a bright blue sky, with the cabin partially visible.

Karu and Kettu are happily working together to build a snow cave in the snowy forest clearing. Karu (blue scarf, red gloves) is shaping the snow with his paws, and Kettu (green hat, yellow gloves) is piling more snow. They are both smiling and laughing. Snowy pine trees are in the background under a bright blue sky, with the cabin partially visible.

Karu and Kettu are standing proudly in front of their newly finished, small snow cave in the snowy forest clearing. The snow cave has a cozy opening. Karu (blue scarf, red gloves) and Kettu (green hat, yellow gloves) are admiring their work with big smiles. Snowy pine trees are in the background under a bright blue sky, with the cabin partially visible.

Karu (blue scarf, red gloves) and Kettu (green hat, yellow gloves) are sitting comfortably inside the small, cozy snow cave they built in the snowy forest clearing. They are smiling, enjoying the small shelter. Snowy pine trees are visible outside the cave entrance under a bright blue sky.

Karu and Kettu are back inside their cozy cabin living room. They are sitting in the armchairs near the stone fireplace, each holding a warm cup of tea. Karu has a blue scarf and red gloves, Kettu has a green hat and yellow gloves. A fire crackles. The room has light brown wooden walls, a wooden floor with a rug.

Karu and Kettu are sitting cozily in their armchairs by the crackling fireplace in their cabin living room, looking content and happy. Karu (blue scarf, red gloves) and Kettu (green hat, yellow gloves) are smiling at each other. Warm lamp light fills the room with light brown wooden walls, a wooden floor with a rug.
